LIGHT.DESCRIPTION: A stackable power, will deal damage to an enemy if you are in #yDreadnought, and will provide #Block if you are in #yGuardian. It will disappear after used.

FRIEND.DESCRIPTION: Friend can fight alongside you. At the start of each turn, Friend will provide you a #yFriend #yCard specific to them. At the second or subsequent times of summoning Friend, they will be #yPromoted and gain #b2 #yTrust.

PROMOTE.DESCRIPTION: After promoted, Friend will provide you a upgraded #yFriend #yCard specific to them at the start of each turn.

FRIEND_CARD.DESCRIPTION: Cards that belong to #yFriends. The numerical values of #yFriend #yCard do not determined by your power but #yFriend's #yTrust instead. #yFriend #yCard do not count towards the hand limit. They are #yEthereal and #yExhausted whenever leave your hand.

TRUST.DESCRIPTION: An attribute of #yFriend. It will increase the damage dealt, #yBlock and #yLight gained by #yFriend #yCard .

PLAY_COST.DESCRIPTION: A special #yEnergy conserved between turns. Can be used and prioritized for #yFriend #yCard .

UNIQUE.DESCRIPTION: After using this card, #yFriend will not provide it in this battle.

POEM'S_LOOK.DESCRIPTION: After you use #yLight , gain equivalent #yShadow . After you use #Shadow , gain equivalent #yLight .

SHADOW.DESCRIPTION: Shadow adds additional damage to Viviana's next attack.

ATK_STANCE.DESCRIPTION: In Dreadnought, gain #yStrength according to your entering times.

DEF_STANCE.DESCRIPTION: In Guardian, gain #yDexterity according to your entering times.

NEARL_STANCE.DESCRIPTION: You can only have one stance ( #yGuardian or #yDreadnought ) at a time.

WFPPower.DESCRIPTION: You can no longer become #yFrail , #yWeak and #yVulnerable . If you have #yBlack #yFiend's #yProtection at the same time, gain #b1 #yArtifact at the start of each turn.

BFPPower.DESCRIPTION: Your first #yAttack which is not #yFriend #yCard , apply #b2 #yVulnerable or #yWeak randomly. If you have #White #yFiend's #yProtection at the same time, change to apply #b2 #yVulnerable and #yWeak .

FriendShelter.DESCRIPTION: Prevent damage you take this turn.

Cold.DESCRIPTION: Deal 25% less damage during multi-hit attacks. Up to two stacks maximum.

FrigidRespite.DESCRIPTION: Friend do not provide #yFriend #yCard, provide #yBlock at the end of turn instead.
